fields.name: Any type of data
fields.description: A resource that describes or discusses the sharing of data obtained from or about humans, in general. It may or may not include a detailed treatment of particular data types (if it does that should also be tagged). An example would be a resource about general data protection legislation. If possible, “any type of data about living humans” should be differentiated according to “sensitive data” and/or “personal data”.

fields.name: Specific data type
fields.description: If the more generic tag does not apply, one or more of the following tags referring to specific data types should be used.

fields.name: Data not derived from living humans
fields.description: Just for structuring, has not to be documented.
